docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Federal health experts are calling for a radical new way of testing AIDS drugs.

headline.main: Radical Change Urged in Testing Of AIDS Drugs

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE robust earnings growth that polished the attractiveness of drug stocks in the 1980's owed much to aggressive increases in drug prices. But pressures to restrain prices are building and that may at least partly explain why pharmaceutical stocks have slipped. This year, pharmaceuticals trail the market by about 5 percent.

headline.main: Market Place;   The Pressures On Drug Stocks

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Spring is here, the season of birds and bees, flowers and trees and wheeze and sneeze for millions of Americans with seasonal allergies. When the runny nose and itchy eyes become sufficiently annoying, most will reach for one of the dozens of over-the-counter or prescription drugs that promise relief from allergy symptoms.
